body:
I think every know about this news on XDA - > http://www.xda-developers.com/android/replace-virtual-cd-on-the-htc-evo-4g-lte/

Sometimes I really need to use a variety of ISO images and I decided not to miss this great chance to make my phone a good tool.

I present to you my application, is very simple, with the availability of the source code, it is called HTC ISO Control.

All you need - select ISO file from the memory card.

WARNING: It can brick you phone! Do the backup!

Only for rooted sense rom (custom or not).

download apk - HTC_ISO_Control_1.0.apk
source on github - https://github.com/ZorgeR/htcisocontrol
market - soon
name: Htcisocontrol
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
